title: my internet is fine but i still jump to 500ping and DC
body: i just play rank for few minutes, and i got 500 ping suddenly, and attempting to reconnect, i thought my internet is gone crazy again, so i restart my broadband ,but still can not login, and i saw so many people got this problem. it happend to me several times, i can still visit any website play any game but LOL, i think it is ur server's problem, and now i got punish again 5game 30minutes. pls fix it , my ID is luchenchen.
